thanks for replying. It is really hard for me to comprehend how can one be so self-absorbed and still engage in various behaviours that can be so damaging to others. It's a total lack of empathy that I as a natural empath could never begin to understand. I am planning to move out as soon as possible (maybe in a month or two or more with a wonderful friend). I love my mom so f much and I know she has her own struggles but sometimes I just feel like she's kinda engaging with his behaviours. It's a very difficult situation. This was the first fight (that almost got physical with screams and threats and ugly insults) in maybe 10 years so I can see she must be. I'm just waiting for this quarantine thing to go down a bit so I'll can go back to therapy. thanks for all kind words.

A few times. First time I had the breakthrough, it was so weird. I felt as if I was falling through a tunnel and had my eyes open when suddenly this man (looked like Ze Pilintra, an entity from an Afro-brazilian religion) put his hands in front of my eyes as if he was trying to say "close them and enjoy the trip". Curiously I've always wanted to know more about this religion but never went to any temple. The other times I smoked I could feel some presences in my room.

It looks cool and pretty and rad, it feels cool, the pain is totally manageable. If it's something you really want to, why not? I'd do it again and maybe I will because it retracted way more than I expected.

I can't make one half go up one down, I don't know if it's lack of practice or because it retracted a bit. The other tricks took me about 2 weeks to learn... I guess the bottom right picture was taken right after I took the stitches, 6 days. Until I could talk understandably maybe 2 weeks. Until I lose the lisp it created about a year and a half... (Curious fact: I had a lisp before and now since everything's healed I don't anymore)... The people I kiss always comment on it, that it's good, different, sometimes it feels like 2 tongues instead of one. Someone (male) told me that they haven't seen much difference in oral sex. Now woman like it way better lol

Also the pain radiates to the jaw and near muscles so it's ridiculously painful but totally manageable. When trying to eat (because the food would stuck between the halves) it wouldn't hurt nor sting. I only felt it sting a bit when I drank ginger ale.

It was performed with local anesthesia that lasted the whole procedure, I guess something about 15~20m, from cutting with a scalpel to stitching each half. When I started to feel the anesthesia fading out I instantly regretted my decision, the pain level was high to unbearable. The professional "prescribed" (he's not a doc so was just an advise) me an OTC analgesic, which I took before the procedure as advised, but I had to double the dosage since only one pill wasn't working at all.
Day 1 bearable pain with analgesics and drooling blood
Day 2 bearable pain with analgesics
Day 3 analgesic starts to lose its effect but pain is still bearable
Day 4 analgesic is not working at all but I still take it, awful pain won't let me sleep. I woke up 4AM crying from pain
Day 5 pain starts to go out on its own, totally bearable wo the remedy
Day 6 no pain thank god, I decided to remove the stitches myself because of all the drooling and it went all good (the drooling wouldn't stop til all the stitches removed)
Yes! I can grab a single frie (as in french frie) or a spoon or a fork... It is nice to feel all the tongue's muscles working to a purpose (usually tricks).

man I did that yesterday and oh my holy fuckin god that was absurd!!! I took half a roofie (.25) and 2mg rivotril(clonazepam) and waited for it to hit. Then I got my syringe and decided to IV 5ml medical grade lidocaine (a nurse friend gave me a vial) really expecting shit. It took almost half an hour to find a vein but when I did holy fuck what trip was that. Really wasn't expecting and I hadn't slept for about 30h so I don't know if it helped increasing its effects. I felt my whole body dizzy and shaking, my mindset was close to weed high but I felt my body on the verge of tumbling couldnt stay by my feet. too bad it lasted for less than 15~20 minutes... Thank you so much for this report, I'd never thought I'd IV lido but was worth it indeed thanks

My first day escorting. I insisted on using condoms, he agreed. Few minutes later I noticed the condom got lost in my canal and I freaked out, got really nervous. The guy was so stupid drunk he barely noticed. I spent the rest of the night trying not to really think about it. Some days later I got symptoms that reminded me of yeast infection but it actually was trichomonas, it took me some creams and pills and about 3 weeks to fully heal only to reinfect myself again and had to do it all again. I get tested every 3~5 months since I was 18. I was lucky I didn't get anything else

Yep, I can't remember a thing. I remember not feeling scared and I think the ket lowered the salvia dysphoria. I have some flashes of some open eyed visuals and they were nice as I became pieces of a puzzle I have on my wall, another time I became my bed sheets and couldn't move my hands because I was sewed. I was expecting something bizarre and scary and dysphoric but it wasn't. Something mind blowing or mind/body rape as some people in this sub say. It was a really mild experience. Would try again in a better set for sure.

Unfortunately the combo gave me such wild amnesia I barely remember what happened. I have vague memories from some moments and that's it. I also think I choose the wrong moment to do it, I was tired after 11 ours on a plane and should have only slept. I recorded on camera about 29 minutes and forgot to turn on the mic. I also had my bf as a sitter and I feel he interfered too much. I tried to dose as little ket as possible and as little salvia too. Still, barely remember. I tried it again about 2 hours later to the same result. Whenever I can get my hands on salvia again I will try again...

Do it at night. I read it somewhere and only had the chance to do salvia 4x. 3x it was day time and way less immersive than at night. 

Now, to me, LSD xps were almost all enjoyable (if not all) but nothing could ever prepare me for salvia. Not shrooms, not ketamine, not even DMT.  I felt salvia was completely dysphoric (and LSD is totally euphoric at least to me) and has the power to completely bend your reality for a few minutes that can feel like lifetimes... I went to a headshop and said it would be my first trip, the guy told me I should buy the 15x extract and smoke half half gram. I smoked way less than he advised me and still was able to breakthrough. After 2 hits I wasn't anymore, at least not human but a pencil. No sitter, not the best set and setting but I wanted to do it again after I was sober again.

I just wanted to try all drugs possible (no interest in crack or meth tho). I don‚Äôt know why, I got really curious about drugs specially lsd when I was 14 (now 22) after reading erowid and my problem child then started using stuff. It was all about altered states of consciousness and self knowledge but then became fun. Sometimes I use it to get calm or to have fun or to trip balls or ego death or euphoria and even dysphoria! I won‚Äôt start using heroin frequently since it is not available in my country, just wanted to try. Also, I‚Äôm prone to addiction and there are things I just don‚Äôt want to mess with.
